snippet: The Agriculture Department says a strain of salmonella in Foster Farms poultry may have caused 278 people to become ill, mostly on the West Coast.
abstract: Agriculture Department issues public health alert, saying strain of salmonella in Foster Farms poultry may have caused 278 people to become ill, mostly on the West Coast.
lead_paragraph: The Agriculture Department says a strain of salmonella in Foster Farms poultry may have caused 278 people to become ill, mostly on the West Coast.

headline.main: U.S. Issues Warning on Salmonella Believed to Be Linked to a Poultry Farm
headline.print_headline: U.S. Issues Warning on Salmonella Believed to Be Linked to a Poultry Farm
